title: Looking for an alternative to BPscript font
content:
Hello,

I am looking for an alternative to [BPscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802224536/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/BPscript)

I find BPscript nice but a little difficult to use. I am looking for a children oriented, elegant alternative. Any suggestion would be great. Many thanks in advance.
author: cariocastyle
